items.value:
Hello my buddy,
you come as called, I'm in the ink!
There are more guests coming to my birthday party than I thought.
Can you please find the following for me:
5x Coffee
5x Tea
5x Donut

Get sure you have 3x free Slot for your Rewards!
i have 3x free Inventory Slot and the Stuff!
i am busy but i will come back!

You can really be trusted!
As a Reward you get from me:

1x A Practical Man Vol.2 (Book)
1x Simple Tub (boxed)
1x Sewing Table (boxed)

Take care and come back soon!
wow thanks, i will come back!

Oh...
and I thought you were done :(
Come back when you have the goods!

And please hurry;)
The birthday party starts soon ..
Ugh.. sry, i will try my best!
